full_summary:
## **Learning Engineering Support to RCAF Training Modernization**

### Request for Information (RFI)

The Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) is inviting the expression of interest from industry partners to provide Learning Engineering Support to RCAF Training Modernization. This request seeks to determine whether industry can offer scalable, innovative, and flexible training solutions to accelerate qualification granting.

### Background

RCAF is modernizing its training program to meet future operational requirements. Traditional classroom settings are no longer sufficient, and innovative training methods are required to develop agile, adaptable, and flexible training options.

### Scope of Support

Industry is invited to provide Learning Engineering Support in the following areas:

- Developing innovative training methods and tools
- Designing and deploying training programs
- Delivering training services
- Collaborating with RCAF stakeholders

### Requirements and Expectations

- Industry partners should have experience in delivering similar training services
- Partners must be able to provide flexible, outcome-based training solutions
- Solutions must be scalable and adaptable to RCAF's evolving training needs
- Solution providers must demonstrate a clear understanding of RCAF's operational requirements

### Attachment

Additional information and requirements can be found in the attached documents:

> https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34680/w6570-24012-rfi_2cad-_learning-_eng_svcs_1.pdf
> https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34680/w6570-24012-rfi-amendment-001.pdf

### Contact Information

For further information or clarification, please contact:

- Cheri Robin
- Email: [cheri.robin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:cheri.robin@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: (204) 833-2500

### Submission Requirements

Please submit your expression of interest to Canada Buy, noting the solicitation number W6570-24012. Late submissions will not be accepted.  The tender closing date is April 26, 2024, at 15:00 EST. 

### Procedure

Please note that this is a Request for Information (RFI) and not a Request for Proposal (RFP). This RFI is for industry to express interest in providing Learning Engineering Support and to provide information on their qualifications and capabilities.
